Installation

  1. Download or clone the repository
  2. Insert the DiddyLevel folder into ServerStorage
  3. Require the module in your server scripts

Basic Usage


local DiddyLevel = require(path.to.DiddyLevel)

DiddyLevel.InitializePlayer(player)
DiddyLevel.AddXP(player, 50)

Features

  • XP-based leveling
  • Custom level curves
  • Server-side safety
